programs.programDescription: The Youth Transportation Ambassadors program is a paid learning opportunity for youth to learn about transportation planning and engage in community-centered education.
programs.activityDescription: Participants will go on weekly field trips, gain valuable skills in transportation project planning, job shadow experts, and work on real projects in their community.
programs.location: Seattle Municipal Tower – 700 5th Ave, Seattle, WA 98104
programs.cost: $600 stipend at the end of the program
